Name: Garden
Texts:
You are at the beautiful garden. You see some gardeners planting white roses.
 You approach one of them and ask if he might have seen your cat Dinah. She says your cat was just arrested by the Queen's guards.
Apparently, the Queen no longer uses hedgehogs as balls during a game of croquet,
she now prefers using cats wrapped in nets to a sphere.
No cat ever survives.
She informs you that the Duchess usually gets invitations to all games of croquet with the Queen.
If you get to her and be nice, she might take you for a game and you get to save Dinah.
